    A list of 205 national and international academic meetings in various disciplines for key features of inclusivity and sustainability and propose solutions to make conferences more modern, effective, equitable and intellectually productive for the research community and environmentally sustainable for our planet.

  • Created by eLife Community Ambassadors

International Biogeographical Society Biennial Conference

Year it was held: 2019

Years the conferences has been held: 18

Disciplines: Biogeography

Gender balance/diversity statement: None

Total Attendance Cost (US dollars): $2000-$4000

Registration Cost (US dollars): $305-$440

Travel Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 4500

Other Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 900

Associated Scientific Society/Organization: International Biogeographical Society

Approx number of Society members (as of 2018): 3500

Approximate Number of Conference Attendees (Exhibitors included): 3000

Geographic Location(s): Malaga, Spain

Years held (Every 6 months, Annual, Biannual, Triannual): Biennial

Host, Funders and Sponsors:

Digital or Virtual Options: None

Digital Archives (Recorded talks & slides): None

Electronic program dissemination:

On-site Maternity Facilities: Yes (There is a nursing room available at the conference centre and babies/nursing mothers are welcome at the conference itself, however children ages 0-2 are unable to be offered childcare due to restrictions that apply regarding facilities and qualification of personnel. )

On-site Childcare Facilities/Services: Yes (Childcare is available free of charge for children ages 3-12 at the conference venue. There is a nursing room available at the conference centre and babies/nursing mothers are welcome at the conference itself, however children ages 0-2 are unable to be offered childcare due to restrictions that apply regarding facilities and qualification of personnel. This service is provided free of charge for IBS Malaga 2019 conference attendees. Staffed by trained personnel, with crafts and activities, Hours available: 8 am – 8pm

Caregiver grant: None

Career Development Events and Workshops: Yes (1. Scientific Writing Workshop 2.The wonderful world of Github 3. How to make a video of your research 4.Making your CV stand out)

ECR promotion events: None

Travel awards for ECRs: Yes a limited number Awards are in the form of 200 € discount on registration, and assessed on need or need-plus-merit.

Code of conduct: https://www.biogeography.org/about-us/code-of-conduct/

Safety Instructions/Apps: None

Keynote speaker gender balance:

Speaker gender balance: 5 Women: 3 Men

Invited speakers gender balance:

Session chair gender balance:

Conference chair gender balance:

Enviromental Sustainability efforts: None

Public Engagement Events Outreach: None

Sustainability Initiatives/Considerations/Green Strategies/Policies: None

Conference url: https://www.biogeography.org/meetings/ibsmalaga2019/
